<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Splat Node Formatting

Represents an arguments splat (i.e. `*bar` in a call like `foo(*bar)`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
hash.values_at(*available)
```

After:

```ruby
hash.values_at(*available)
```

## Formats in a method body

Before:

```ruby
def translate(*args)
  I18n.translate(*args)
end
```

After:

```ruby
def translate(*args)
  I18n.translate(*args)
end
```

## Formats as empty

Before:

```ruby
def not_implemented(*)
  nil
end
```

After:

```ruby
def not_implemented(*)
  nil
end
```
